affect ( "beg_patrol1", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "0" );
	set ( "SET_VIEW_SCRIPT", "kam1/beg_patrol1_see" );
	set ( "SET_VIEWDIST", 512.000 );

	task ( "beg_patrol" )
	{
		set ( "SET_GOAL", "Guard" );
		set ( "SET_SEARCH", < 30.000 50.000 0.000 > );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "beg_patrola" );
		set ( "SET_NAVGOAL2", "beg_patrolb" );
		set ( "SET_NAVGOAL3", "beg_patrolc" );
	}

	dowait ( "beg_patrol" );
}
